pages.text: The Emerald Talisman provides +2 damage to pillager/illager types. It also bonemeals crops within a radius of 2 of the player every 15 seconds. The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_normal)Normal Talisman Base$(/l).  The talisman is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:force_of_overworld)Force of Overworld$(/l).
